document.query: CREATE TABLE `sale_order_item` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `so_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `so_details_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `product_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `reference_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `is_package` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `remark` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `deleted` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
